name: GIANT WASP

traits.name: Flyby
traits.text: The wasp doesn't provoke an Opportunity Attack when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

actions.name: Sting
actions.text: Melee Attack Roll: +4, reach 5 ft. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) Piercing damage plus 5 (2d4) Poison damage.
